parameters.name: IpAddresses
parameters.label: IP Addresses
parameters.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IpAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="","empty" ,IPAddresses)
| summarize by IpAddresses
| sort by IpAddresses desc

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| summarize Events= count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now()), SubType
content.title: Activity, by time

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| summarize count()  by SubType
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Dns events by subtype

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| extend type = case(
    QueryType == "A", "IPv4 address record", 
    QueryType == "AAAA", "IPv6 address record",
    QueryType == "ANY", "All cached records",
    QueryType == "CNAME", "Canonical name record",
    QueryType == "MX", "Mail exchange record",
    QueryType == "NS", "Name server record",
    QueryType == "PTR", "Pointer record",
    QueryType == "SIG", "Signature",
    QueryType == "SOA", "Start of authority record",
    QueryType == "SRV", "Service locator",
    QueryType == "TXT", "Text record",
    strcat('Other'))
| summarize count()  by type
content.title: DNS events per query type

content.query:
let data = DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == "LookupQuery"
| extend Domain = Name;
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Domain
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Domain
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Domain
| order by TotalCount desc, Domain asc
| project Domain, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Computer , Domain
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Domain, Computer
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Domain, Computer
| order by TotalCount desc, Domain asc
| project Domain, Computer, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Domain
| project Id, Name = Computer, Type = 'Computer', ['Computer Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Domain, Type = 'Domain', ['Computer Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Computer Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Top domains queried

content.query:
let Selector = dynamic({ComputerSelector});
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where (Selector.Type == '*' or (Selector.Type == 'Computer' and Computer == Selector.Name)) or (Selector.Type == '*' or (Selector.Type == 'Domain' and Name == Name))
| where SubType == "LookupQuery" 
| summarize Domains = dcount(Name) by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
content.title: Unique domains queried

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| extend NameParts = split(Name,'.')
//Break the domain into its parts
| extend Top_Level_Domain =  strcat(NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-2)],'.',NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-1)] )
//Use the rightmost parts of the URL
| extend Top_Level_Domain = iif(strlen(Top_Level_Domain)<7,strcat(NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-3)],'.',Top_Level_Domain),Top_Level_Domain)
//If the two right most parts are too short (e.g. "co.uk" or "com.tr", add another part
| summarize SubDomainCount = count() by Top_Level_Domain, Name
| join kind= inner
(
    DnsEvents
    | extend NameParts = split(Name,'.')
    //Break the domain into its parts
    | extend Top_Level_Domain =  strcat(NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-2)],'.',NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-1)] )
    //Use the rightmost parts of the URL
    | extend Top_Level_Domain = iif(strlen(Top_Level_Domain)<7,strcat(NameParts[toint(array_length(NameParts)-3)],'.',Top_Level_Domain),Top_Level_Domain)
    //If the two right most parts are too short (e.g. "co.uk" or "com.tr", add another part
    | summarize Total_Sub_Domains = count() by Top_Level_Domain
)
on Top_Level_Domain
| extend pk = SubDomainCount/todouble(Total_Sub_Domains)
| extend h1= -log2(pk)*pk
//calculate entropy according to Sannon function https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Shannon_entropy
| summarize Sub_Domain_Entropy = sum(h1), Total_Sub_Domains = any(Total_Sub_Domains) ,make_list(Name)  by Top_Level_Domain
| order by Sub_Domain_Entropy desc
content.title: Domain entropy

items.name: query - 1 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.query:
DnsInventory
| where SubType == "Server"
| project Computer, DomainName, ForestName, ServerIPs
content.title: Active servers

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == 'LookupQuery' and isnotempty(MaliciousIP)
| summarize Attempts = count() by  Computer,RemoteIPCountry, IndicatorThreatType
| order by Attempts desc
content.title: Malicious traffic

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == 'LookupQuery' and isnotempty(MaliciousIP)
| summarize Attempts = count() by ClientIP, MaliciousIP
| project ClientIP , MaliciousIP, Attempts
content.title: Malicious traffic by client IP address

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == "DynamicRegistration"
| summarize count() by Result

//DNS Configuration Events
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == "ConfigurationChange"
| project TimeGenerated, Category = TaskCategory, Event_ID = EventId
content.title: Configuration events

content.query:
DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == "LookupQuery"
| extend Reasons = case(
    ResultCode == 0, "No Error",
    ResultCode == 1, "Format Error",
    ResultCode == 2, "Server Failure",
    ResultCode == 3, "Non-Existent Domain",
    ResultCode == 4, "Not Implemented",
    ResultCode == 5, "Query Refused",
    ResultCode == 6, "Name Exists when it should not",
    ResultCode == 7, "RR Set Exists when it should not",
    ResultCode == 8, "RR Set that should exist does not",
    ResultCode == 9, "Server Not Authoritative for zone",
    ResultCode == 10, "Name not contained in zone",
    ResultCode == 16, "TSIG Signature Failure",
    ResultCode == 17, "Key not recognized",
    ResultCode == 18, "Signature out of time window",
    ResultCode == 19, "Bad TKEY Mode",
    ResultCode == 20, "Duplicate key name",
    ResultCode == 21, "Algorithm not supported",
    ResultCode == 22, "Bad Truncation",
    ResultCode == 23, "Bad/missing Server Cookie",
    strcat('Other', ResultCode))
| summarize count() by Reasons

DnsEvents
| extend IPAddresses = iif(IPAddresses=="", "empty", IPAddresses)
| where "*" in ({IpAddresses}) or IPAddresses in ({IpAddresses})
| where SubType == "LookupQuery"
| summarize count() by ClientIP
| order by count_ desc
| project IP = ClientIP , Queries=count_
